text: tinence happens when people have a sudden need to urinate and arent able to hold their urine long enough to get to the toilet.  Urgency urinary incontinence happens when people have a sudden need to urinate and arent able to hold their urine long enough to get to the toilet. - Mixed urinary incontinence is a mix of stress and urgency urinary incontinence.
